actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Blackbeard Island National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Ga. as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates various lands in the Blackbeard Island National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Georgia, as the Blackbeard Island Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Blackbeard Island National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Ga. as wilderness.
